entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then a few flurries beginning overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
